entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 04:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -25.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -28.6°C
Wind: W 40 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries along the Strait. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Flurries along the Strait this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
